DataElement.preferredName: Patient Orthotopic Neobladder Surgical Procedure Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to any surgical procedure for the creation of a new bladder (neobladder) for a patient after cystectomy participating in a clinical trial._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to any surgical procedure for the creation of a new bladder (neobladder) for a patient after cystectomy participating in a clinical trial.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in its normal location..:A urinary diversion after the removal of the urinary bladder that uses a loop of intestine that is surgically fashioned into a pouch and placed in the location of the original bladder and then attached to the ureters and urethra simulating the function of the original organ.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:Any stepwise set of actions.

Concepts.definition: A urinary diversion after the removal of the urinary bladder that uses a loop of intestine that is surgically fashioned into a pouch and placed in the location of the original bladder and then attached to the ureters and urethra simulating the function of the original organ.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have any typ
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any type of orthotopic neobladder?
